pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Chalk Harness---This package wraps [Chalk's CLI](https://github.com/chalk-ai/cli)with Python to aid with testing.---Chalk enables innovative machine learning teams to focus on buildingthe unique products and models that make their business stand out.Behind the scenes Chalk seamlessly handles data infrastructure witha best-in-class developer experience.---## Example Usage```pythonharness = CLIHarness()harness.apply_await(force=True)version = harness.version()assert version.version == "v0.4.5" == harness.version_tag_only()print(harness.whoami().user)print(harness.token().token)```
